1.name: Nature's Wrath
1.details:
When Quill basic attacks or hits enemy Hero with Quick Release 4 times, Quill will send an extra arrow, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and creating a field around the target.

Quill gains increased attack speed and movement speed while on the field.

2.name: Quick Release
2.details: Quill dashes in a target direction and shoots an arrow to a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power). This arrow counts as basic attack and prioritises enemy Hero.

3.name: Volley
3.details: Quill gains the ability to shoot 3 arrows instead of 1 on her basic attack and Quick Release, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to 2 other nearby enemies, prioritising enemy Heroes.

4.name: Hail of Arrows
4.details: Quill leaps back and shoots out a hail of arrow at a target area, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and slowing all enemies on top.

5.name: Piercing Arrows
5.details:
Quill gains increased range on her basic attack and other abilities.

In addition, each basic attack or Quick Release will pierce through the enemy, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit.
